required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First-in-Human Study of EOS100850 in Patients With Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I/Ib First-in-Human Study of EOS100850 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: Multicenter, open-label, dose-escalation Phase I/Ib clinical study to evaluate the safety and tolerability, the MTD/RP2D, pharmacokinetics (PK), pharmacodynamics (PD), and antitumor activity of EOS100850 in patients with advanced solid tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Dose-Limiting Toxicities (DLTs) in patients with advanced solid tumors receiving EOS100850
primary_outcome.description: To define the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) or the recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) of EOS100850 in patients receiving EOS100850

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of AEs in patients receiving EOS100850
primary_outcome.description: To assess safety and tolerability as measured by incidence and severity of AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentration of EOS100850 vs. time profiles
secondary_outcome.description: Determined by inspection of the concentration-time profile
Determined by inspection of the concentration-time profile
Determined by inspection of the concentration-time profile

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve in 1 dosing interval [AUC(TAU)]
secondary_outcome.description: Determined by inspection of the concentration-time profile
Determined by inspection of the concentration-time profile

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall response rate per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors (RECIST) v1.1
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of preliminary efficacy of EOS100850

arm_group.description: Specified EOS100850 dose on specified days

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding participation in the Trial, please refer to your physician
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women and men â‰¥18 years of age with Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1
- Subject with histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced solid tumor for whom no standard treatment is further available.
- At least 4 weeks since any previous treatment for cancer
- Subject must consent to pretreatment and on treatment tumor biopsies
- Adequate organ and marrow function
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with primary brain tumors or primary tumors with central nervous system metastases as only location of disease. Controlled brain metastases are permitted
- Participants with second/other active cancers requiring current treatment
- Uncontrolled/significant heart disease
- Known History of chronic hepatitis, Positive test for Hepatitis B virus surface antigen or Hepatitis C antibody (except participants with liver cancer) or Human Immunodeficiency Virus/Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome(HIV/AIDS)
- Active/uncontrolled autoimmune disease
- Active infection
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply
